Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Pivotal HD™ <http://gopivotal.com/apj> provides a foundation for change – a platform that addresses the complexity and implementation costs of Hadoop and enhancing it with the expressive power of Structured Query Language (SQL). It taps into vast amounts of data to provide organizations with insights that can be used to discover new business value. <http://gopivotal.com/apj>
SQL is an extremely powerful and widely adopted way to manipulate and understand data. Until now, Hadoop's SQL capability has been limited and impractical for many. Pivotal HD is the new benchmark for SQL on Hadoop - the most functionally-rich, mature and robust offering available.
Benefits of Pivotal HD: <http://gopivotal.com/apj#2>
- Enhance the Data Scientist and Analyst Hadoop SQL experience with HAWQ
- Simplify the Hadoop Operator experience with enterprise Hadoop extensions
- Improving the Hadoop Administrator experience with Pivotal Command Center
For more information, visit our Pivotal HD Asia Pacific website <http://gopivotal.com/apj>.
View our infographic <http://play.gopivotal.com/rs/pivotal/images/Pivotal-HD-APJ-infographic-DataLake_Border.jpg> to see how Pivotal HD helps enterprises get to new business value.
Pivotal, committed to open source and open standards, is a leading provider of application and data infrastructure software, agile development services, and data science consulting with selected technology, people, and programs from EMC and VMware including Greenplum, Cloud Foundry, Spring, GemFire and other products from the VMware vFabric Suite, Cetas, and Pivotal Labs.
